name: Buffer Overflow Basic
description: Learn basic buffer overflow techniques on a vulnerable Linux binary.

name: Web App SQLi
description: Exploit SQL injection vulnerabilities in a web application.

name: Windows Privilege Escalation
description: Practice privilege escalation techniques on Windows systems.

name: Network Services Enumeration
description: Learn to enumerate and exploit common network services.

name: Active Directory Attack
description: Advanced AD attack techniques including Kerberoasting and DCSync.

name: Docker Escape
description: Break out of misconfigured Docker containers.
